title: (None, '', u'nilearn/_utils/param_validation.py')

text:
I find this threshold a bit strange. This has 50% chance to occur in real life... ?
I would test if mask_volme < 1.1 * MNI152_BRAIN_VOLUME
and Mask_volume >.5 * MNI152_BRAIN_VOLUME
Maybe I'm missing something.
title: (None, '', u'nilearn/_utils/param_validation.py')
